headline: Block (SQ): Assessing Valuation After Earnings Miss and Volatile Share Response
summary: Block (NYSE:XYZ) sparked intense market chatter after its third-quarter earnings fell short of expectations, mainly due to slower growth from Square and rising expenses. The results caused noticeable swings in Block's share price. See our latest analysis for Block. Block’s shares have struggled to regain momentum this year, with a sharp drop following Q3 earnings adding to an overall year-to-date share price return of -23.0%. headline: SoFi Is Officially Back in the Crypto Game. What Investors Should Know.
summary: The company on Tuesday announced the launch of SoFi Crypto, a platform allowing customers to buy, sell, and hold dozens of digital currencies including Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana.  A phased rollout begins today and will extend to more members over the coming weeks, SoFi said.  With the new product, SoFi has become the first national chartered consumer bank to allow members to buy, sell, and hold crypto, the company added.
